duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain proficiency in EDC functionality and establish relationships with site data & regulatory coordinators.
Ensure quality control of submitted Case Report Forms (CRFs) and act as an Evaluator for the internal Clinical Research Coordinator in training.
Maintain regulatory documentation for all assigned sites and support Good Clinical Practices (GCP) guidelines and FDA regulations.
Perform QC audits of the clinical database and work closely with onsite team to confirm appropriate consenting and data abstraction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred, 3-5 years of GCP/clinical research regulatory experience
